name: Hiking in the old terraced vineyards of Lavaux,  a big must for the visitors of Lausanne
description: The good-three-hour walking tour is the opportunity to see authentic vineyards built by monks, who cleared the land and built walls to create terraces for the planting of vines. Once we reach the top (by train), walk down could be made through small wineproducer`s villages, while wine tasting could make this tour even more relaxed. Since 2007, the Lavaux vineyards are protected by UNESCO.
